title: 'Revolution brings out the best in France': Exclusive interview with Dimitri Yachvili and how the 2011 French mutiny revived their World Cup
text:
Former France scrum-half Dimitri Yachvili says that ‘revolution’ has always been part of the French psyche as talk of unrest and rebellion at their current training base in Kumamoto prompts memories of the rallying drive towards the World Cup final in 2011 when Les Bleus went from pool-stage ignominy to coming within a couple of points of toppling the All Blacks and sending the entire country of New Zealand into a collective breakdown.
